test_Description:
1.Open browser and navigate to URL :
"https://lcaas.techmahindra.com/java
2. Enter the value 'demouser' in the field.
3. Enter the value 'demouser1' in the field.
4. Click on 'Login'.
5. Click on 'Master Inventory'.
6. Click on 'X-Ref Report'.
7. Click on 'Spider'.
8. Click on 'Flow Diagrams'.
9. Click on 'Call Chain'.
10. Click on 'Control Flow'.
11. Click on 'Program Process Flow'.
12. Click on 'Business Rule Extraction'.
13. Click on 'Rules report'.
14. Click on 'Sankey Diagram'.
15. Click on 'Screen Report'.
16. Click on 'Screen Definition'.
17. Click on 'Screen Validation'.
18. Click on 'CRUD'.
19. Click on 'Glossary'.
20. Click on 'Variable Impact Report'.
21. Click on 'Missing Component'.
22. Click on 'Commented Lines Report'.
23. Click on 'Technical Debt Report'.
24. Click on 'Orphan Report'.
25. Click on 'User Guide'.
26. Click on 'Log Out'.
